Andrew Wiggins had 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt ) , 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block in 33 minutes . Jeff Teague chipped in with 16 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and 12 assists as well . Karl-Anthony Towns went 14 - of - 27 from the field to score a game - high of 41 points , while also adding 14 rebounds in 37 minutes . Westbrook had a very impressive game , going 15 - for - 28 from the field and 6 - for - 11 from the 3 - point line to score a game - high of 38 points . Paul George had 25 points ( 8 - 25 FG , 7 - 14 3Pt ) , 5 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steal and 2 block in 38 minutes . Steven Adams came 1 rebound short of a double - double and finished with 14 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 3 - 9 FT ) and 11 rebounds . Next , the Thunder will head to Portland to face Trail_Blazers on Thursday . The Timberwolves now head to Detroit for a Wednesday night showdown versus the Pistons .

Bobby Portis went 6 - for - 11 from the floor and 1 - for - 1 from beyond the arc to score 14 points , while adding 11 rebounds to go with . The only other Heat to reach double figures in points was Josh Richardson , who finished with 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) in 35 minutes . Bam Adebayo was very efficient in this game , going 6 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the free throw line to finish with 16 points , while also adding 11 rebounds . The Wizards now head to Los_Angeles for a Tuesday night showdown versus the Lakers  while the Miami Heat will return home to face the Magic on Tuesday .

The Bulls had 5 players score in double figures , but were led by Walt Lemon off the bench , who scored 24 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 2 FT ) , while contributing 8 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal .
